I put this and all other CCBs (calcium channel blockers) as SYM. To classify prinzmetal's as coronary artery disease (CAD) is a very loose definition of CAD, I think (nearly all CAD is not prinzmetal's and the pathophysiology and treatment of most types of CAD differs quite dramatically from prinzmetal's). Also, CSH and AJG have put all the other CCBs as SYM for CAD.
